requirment.title: Experience with using Linux CLI
Experience with Docker
Experience with Network (Firewall, NAT, etc)
Experience with Kubernetes
Curiosity to explore creative solutions and try new things
Familiar with HTML, JavaScript/TypeScript, and CSS
Familiar with React.js, Next.js, or similar frameworks
Familiar integrating JSON data sources and APIs
Familiar with version controls system such as Git & Github
Curiosity to explore creative solutions and try new things
Interested in iOS technology and programming language (React Native, Objective C, etc.)
Familiar with web services, specifically REST APIs over JSON
Working knowledge of the general mobile landscape, architectures, trends, and emerging technology
Have good understanding in algorithm and programming language
Interested in system development and coding best-practice
Proficiency in server side programming such as NodeJS, python, php, with development framework
Knowledge of various database and storage technology like MongoDB, MySQL, Postgresql, Redis, NodeJS, Typescript, etc.
Excellent understanding of software engineering concepts, design patterns, and algorithms
Passion in software engineering, application development, or systems development
Curiosity to explore creative solutions and try new things
